title: In case of redevelopment scheme, size of tenement can be relaxed for Rehab Component subject to other provisions of UDCPR
clause_text: In case of redevelopment scheme, size of tenement can be relaxed for Rehab Component subject to other provisions of UDCPR. However for free sale component TOD Regulation shall be made applicable.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of redevelopment scheme, size of tenement can be relaxed for Rehab Component subject to other provisions of UDCPR. However for free sale component TOD Regulation shall be made applicable.
